gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all screen schemes in order to understand how issues are displayed across different projects.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all screen schemes with their respective IDs, names, and descriptions.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new screen scheme to customize how issues are presented in my project.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully create a new screen scheme and return the ID, name, and details of the created scheme.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I want to delete an obsolete screen scheme to keep the project clean and organized.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified screen scheme and return a success message.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to update an existing screen scheme to reflect the new workflow requirements of my team.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully update the screen scheme and return the updated details including the new configuration.
